author: stsp
msg: (debug_vprintf): Increase local buffer size so clients built with
SQLITE3_DEBUG don't assert in SVN_DBG() because SQL statements exceed

author: schor
msg: [UIMA-3969] add scaffolding to wrap JsonGenerator method's IOExceptions into SAXExceptions to fit into our XmiCasSerialization.  Fix test case for getNumberOfChildren to access the value in the inner class.  Add some structures needed for JSON serialization, make many things in the inner class "final", update constructor for that.

author: kwall
msg: QPID-5967: [Java Broker Tests] Add missing test assertion and extra logging to understand occasional failure.
